courseDescription:
Do you want to program and build your own game and start your game development journey? If yes, then this free online HTML certification is a step in the right direction. While HTML is a standard language for creating web pages, JavaScript is a text-based programming language that helps make a website more interactive. Canvas is an HTML tag or element which provides an easy and powerful way to draw graphics using JavaScript. By the end of this free online course, you will have two simple but immersive games of your own and the games you will be developing as part of your course project are Pong Battle and Bubble Popper.

You will learn to code games by covering the entire core gaming concepts in an interesting and engaging way and the fundamentals of creating games using HTML5 and JavaScript are covered in detail. How to draw on the canvas, create keyboard clicks and keyboard events to make action happen within the canvas elements as well as the game design basics to create objects, track objects, detect collision, add second objects or animation frames, and make final tweaks and adjustments for the overall functioning game are all covered in this section of the course. Having smooth and vivid animation is very critical for game success, and how to achieve this will be taught as well as some bonus content that provides all the source codes as downloadable files to get you through the lessons and apply your learning.

This HTML course is perfect for anyone who wants to be a game developer as it teaches you all the basic techniques to create a game using HTML5, Canvas, and JavaScript as well as other coding fundamentals that you need in order to expand your coding skills. Coding and programming is a critical skill in the modern world because of the advent of digital technology, online marketing and mobile apps. If you are keen to explore development with a focus on gaming as a career, then you need to learn HTML and JavaScript because of their popularity and enrolling in this course will set you up for success.
